DeadlyFascination.Description: Replaces Deadly Fascination with a much weaker Dazzling Bladework.

BolsterSpell.Description: Increases the level increase from bolstered from +1 to +2.

AbundantCasting.Description: Now grants two bonus casts instead of four.

ArchmageArmor.Description: No longer works when cast from items and requires you know mage armor as a prerequisite.

DimensionalRetribution.Description: Rework of Dimensional Retribution to make it work more like dweomercat leap. This means it is an automatic action that teleports you and does an attack of opportunity.

ElementalBarrage.Description: Rework of Elemental barrage to turn it into a caster mythic instead of a weird martial mythic.

GreaterEnduringSpells.Description: Now extends spells that last 10+ minutes instead of 5+ minutes.

SpellCastersOnslaught.Description: Rework of Spell Caster's Onslaught to make it more appealing for gish builds.

UnrelentingAssault.Description: Damage per round has been increased to 4 from 2.

MythicImprovedCritical.Description: Rework of Mythic Improved Critical to double the amount of weapon dice rolled on critical hit.

MythicSneakAttack.Description: Rework of Mythic Sneak Attack to increase the size of the damage dice instead of adding an extra dice.

SchoolMastery.Description: School Mastery now increases CL by 2 instead of 1.

AeonBaneBuffNames.Description: Updates Aeon Bane buff names to improve UI readability.

AeonBaneAction.Description: Aeon Bane is now a free action instead of a swift.

AeonBaneDamage.Description: Aeon Bane now calculates damage more correctly and is displayed better in the UI. This also improves stacking with inquisitor bane.

AeonBaneSpellDispel.Description: Aeon Bane now dispels on all spell effects not just spells with attack rolls.

AeonBaneSpellResistance.Description: Aeon Bane adds mythic rank to spell resistance checks.

AeonBaneUses.Description: Aeon Bane usages now scale at 2x Mythic level + Character level.

AeonGazeActionSystem.Description: Aeon Gaze now functions like Inquisitor Judgments where multiple can be activated for the same resource usage at swift action speed.

AeonGazeIcons.Description: Aeon Gaze buffs now all are visible with proper icons.

AeonGreaterBaneActionBoost.Description: Aeon Greater Bane now allows you to cast swift action spells as a move action.

AeonGreaterBaneDamage.Description: Aeon Greater Bane damage is now rolled into the main weapon attack instead of a separate instance.

AeonImprovedBaneDamage.Description: Aeon Improved Bane now calculates damage more correctly and is displayed better in the UI.

AeonImprovedBaneDispelLimit.Description: Aeon Improved Bane now uses greater dispel magic rules to remove 1/4 CL buffs where CL is defined as Character Level + Mythic Rank.

PatchAeonGreaterBaneDispel.Description: Aeon Greater Bane now has the guaranteed auto dispel on first hit.

AivuUpgrades.Description: Aivu stats and abilities have been upgraded based on tabletop Havoc Dragon statblocks.

AzataPerformanceResource.Description: Performances can now be used a number of rounds equal to character level + mythic rank.

AzataSpellList.Description: Azata spell list now contains all "Subpath" spells by default.

AzataSongActions.Description: Azata songs are now move actions instead of standard actions.

AzataSongIcons.Description: Azata songs now all have unique icons.

AzataSongToggles.Description: Azata songs can now be started outside of combat.

FavorableMagic.Description: Favorable magic now works on spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities.

RainbowArrows.Description: Rainbow Arrows now applies random debuffs in addition to damage.

SongsOfSteel.Description: Songs of Steel Now lasts 10 minutes/CL and is a communal buff.

ZippyMagic.Description: Now works on spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities. Can now be toggled off to avoid issues while buffing.

IncredibleMight.Description: Incredible Might now grants a mythic bonus instead of a morale bonus.

LifeBondingFriendship.Description: Life Bonding Friendship now scales with Mythic Rank instead of Charisma.

SupersonicSpeed.Description: Supersonic Speed now grants an additional attack in addition to haste.

DeadlyMagic.Description: Deadly magic can now be used for a number of rounds equal to your mythic rank.

DecayingTouch.Description: Decaying touch has been completely rewritten to have fewer bugs with how it applies damage.

EclipseChill.Description: Eclipse Chill DC scales at 10 + 1/2 character level + your mythic rank + highest stat bonus. and can now be used for a number of rounds equal to your mythic rank.

FearControl.Description: Fear Control DC scales at 10 + 1/2 character level + your mythic rank + highest stat bonus.

TainedSneakAttack.Description: Tainted sneak attack now works with spells and the DC scales at 10 + 1/2 character level + your mythic rank + highest stat bonus.

BoundOfPossibility.Description: This cloak allows Trickster to roll any skill check twice and take the best result.

Progression.Description: Updates Trickster Progression to re order when tricks are gained.

TricksterKnowledgeArcana2.Description: Updates the enchantment list available to be added. This should be a power increase.

TricksterKnowledgeArcana3.Description: Updates the enchantment list available to be added. This should be a power increase.

TricksterLoreNature3.Description: Has a rebuilt loot table that includes a much larger amount of items.

TricksterLoreReligion2/3.Description: Domains powers are rebuilt to use character level as effective cleric level and mythic rank as effective wisdom modifier. Now qualifies for Domain Zealot. Spells now exist in a domain spellbook instead of spell like abilities.

TricksterMobility3.Description: Now works on all attack rolls including spell attack rolls.

TricksterPerception1.Description: Now grants rerolls on concealment and stealth detection.

TricksterPerception2.Description: No longer grants feat access. Now grants fortification rerolls, bypass crit and sneak immunity, and +2 crit range.

TricksterPerception3.Description: Now grants all perception tricks to allies within 60 feet.

TricksterPersuasion2.Description: Now causes a DC 15 + Persuasion ranks save or be staggered for 1 round. Additionally demoralize now reduces a targets attack and damage by 1 + half your mythic rank.

TricksterPersuasion3.Description: Demoralize now causes enemies to attack the nearest target instead of acting normally 50% of the time. Additionally demoralize now reduces a targets AC and Saves by 1 + half your mythic rank.

TricksterStealth1.Description: This invisibility can no longer be seen through by divination magic such as True Seeing, See Invisibility, or Thoughtsense.

TricksterStealth2.Description: This invisibility can no longer be seen through by divination magic such as True Seeing, See Invisibility, or Thoughtsense.

TricksterStealthAbilityName.Description: Fixing broken naming convention on the Stealth ability.

TricksterTrickery3.Description: This now grants rank 1 and 2 tricks quicken and reach.

TricksterUseMagicDevice2.Description: Now grants completely normal magic in addition to endless wands.

UpdateIcons.Description: Updates icons to use new unique ones.
